stimulusHtml: Marinetti’s manifesto had the greatest influence on which of the following political groups?

features.html:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the statement below.

“We will glorify war—the only cure for the world—militarism, patriotism, the destructive gesture of the anarchist, beautiful ideas worth dying for, and scorn for woman.”

Filippo Tommaso Marinetti, Italian writer and artist, “Futurist Manifesto,” 1909
